name: Isolated in the Space
description:
You were going to your regular walk in the space, when something has suddenly appeared on the horison: a giant, spinning wormhole. You thought that's gonna be a great idea to inspect it. Well, you floated closer to the wormhole, but then something terrible happened: you got stuck into that, and got teleported to somewhere in the space, isolated from any kind of human contact. What a disease! You might not see your cat anymore! But don't be reconciled in it! I challange you to find your way back home, so you can hug your wife and pat your cute cat. Are you in?

Creators:

Programmer: DeLannoy 

Pixel Artist + Programmer: Rongchu

Sound Artist: Niche
